page.title: 02PLOCKTON DISTRICT.
page.content: { PLOCKTON DISTRICT}IS SITUATED IN LOCHALSH,PART OF THE{HIGHLAND REGION} IN SCOTLAND.A FEW MILES WEST ACROSS THE WATER IS THE ISLE OF SKYE. THERE IS A TOTAL POPULATION OF 400 LIVING IN THE DISTRICT,MOSTLY IN{ {PLOCKTON}BUT THERE ARE SMALLER VILLAGES AT{DUIRINISH}AND{DRUMBUIE.} OF THE TOTAL POPULATION,312 ARE ADULTS,34 ARE AT SECONDARY SCHOOL,34 ARE AT PRIMARY SCHOOL AND 20 ARE BELOW THE AGE OF 5.THESE NUMBERS ARE FOR 1985. THE AREA IS SURROUNDED BY HIGH MOUNTAINS AND BY THE SEALOCH{ {LOCHCARRON.}FOR MOST OF THE YEAR IT IS QUIET AND PEACEFUL BUT IT IS VERY BUSY IN THE SUMMER BECAUSE IT IS POPULAR WITH TOURISTS. WE HOPE TO TELL YOU A BIT ABOUT OUR LIVES IN THE REST OF THE TEXT PAGES.
